original_text: Then the servant left, taking with him ten of his master’s camels loaded with all kinds of good things from his master. He set out for Aram Naharaim and made his way to the town of Nahor.
korean_text: 이에 종이 그 주인의 낙타 중 열 필을 끌고 떠났는데 곧 그의 주인의 모든 좋은 것을 가지고 떠나 메소보다미아로 가서 나홀의 성에 이르러

sentences.original_text: taking with him ten of his master's camels
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 주인의 낙타 열 마리를 데리고

sentences.original_text: loaded with all kinds of good things from his master
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 주인의 모든 종류의 좋은 것들로 실린

sentences.original_text: He set out for Aram Naharaim
and made his way to the town of Nahor
